titleStmt.title: The judgment of the foreign reformed churches concerning the rites and offices of the Church of England shewing there is no necessity of alterations : in a letter to a member of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Willes, John, 1646 or 7-1700.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Willis. cf. NUC pre-1956.
